sentences.en: 'Monseigneur , he was whiter than the miller.
sentences.cn: “ 大人, 他比磨坊老板还要白.

sentences.en: Could I bother you to give the package to Mr. Miller?
sentences.cn: 麻烦你把这个包裹交给米勒先生好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every miller draws water to his own mill.
sentences.cn: 磨坊主都往自己磨里注水.

sentences.en: He said he teamed up with Miller in a number of robberies.
sentences.cn: 他说他和米勒合作搞了一系列的抢劫.

sentences.en: Miller and Ferlinghetti got to be friends.
sentences.cn: 米勒和费林盖蒂渐渐成了朋友。

sentences.en: Miller used to dine out on his popularity as a playwright.
sentences.cn: 米勒过去常靠着他剧作家的声望被邀赴宴.

sentences.en: Miller was concerned about the $ 35 million we had already invested.
sentences.cn: 米勒所关心的是我们已投进去的三千五百万美元.

sentences.en: Mr. Miller was sent as an emissary for the peace talks.
sentences.cn: 米勒先生被作为特使派遣去参加和平谈判。

sentences.en: Much water runs by the mill that the miller knows not of.
sentences.cn: 世上有许多事是我们所不知道的.

sentences.en: Our other white knight was G. William Miller , secretary of the treasury.
sentences.cn: 我们的另一位白衣骑士是财政部长G · 威廉·米勒.

sentences.en: Piquancy was added to the situation because Dr Porter was then on the point of marrying Hugh Miller.
sentences.cn: 当时的情形因正赶上波特博士要和休·米勒结婚，便又多了几分趣味。

sentences.en: Skiff Miller shook his head, no longer belligerent, but kindly.
sentences.cn: 斯基夫·米勒摇了摇头, 但态度已从敌对转为友好.

sentences.en: The appeal in Miller's pictures of Indian women is undercut at times by what the artist writes about them.
sentences.cn: 米勒画作中印第安妇女的魅力有时会被艺术家的文字描述削弱。

sentences.en: The Observer found the play "a feeble rehash of familiar Miller themes"
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》认为这部剧“是大家熟悉的米勒式主题的拙劣翻版”。

words.tran_cn: 工厂；磨坊；磨粉机；制造厂；压榨机
碾磨；磨成粉；滚（碾轧）金属（mill的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 老掉牙的笑话；笑话集（1793年出版）

trans.tran_cn: （尤指面粉厂的）厂主，磨房主，碾磨工，[昆]蛾
trans.tran_en: someone who owns or works in a mill which makes flour
